General.Name: Bohra Industries Limited
General.Description: Bohra Industries Limited manufactures and trades in phosphate fertilizers in India. The company offers single super phosphate, granulated single super phosphate, triple super phosphate, rock phosphate, and other fertilizers. It markets its products through dealers and marketers under the MAHALAXMI brand. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Udaipur, India.
